widgets.widget_text: React is front-end frame work of JS
India is the seventh-largest country by land area, and the second-most populous country in the world.
Japan is an island country in East Asia, located in the northwest Pacific Ocean. It is known for its rich culture and technological advancements.
Lionel Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward. He is often considered the best player in the world and one of the greatest of all time.
Serena Williams is an American professional tennis player and former world No. 1 in women's single tennis. She is regarded as one of the greatest tennis players of all time.
Virat Kohli is an Indian cricketer and former captain of the Indian national team. He is widely regarded as one of the best batsmen of his generation.
